title: “Our lawyer wrote this title.” (LIVE from Sacramento)
description: Trump tweets about his crimes, and Republicans pass a tax bill that will define the 2018 elections. California Attorney General Xavier Becerra, Stockton Mayor Michael Tubbs, and Erin Gloria Ryan join Jon, Jon, Tommy, and Dan on stage live from Sacramento, California.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
